list-item.p: The GVN is an international research network comprised of 52 Centers of Excellence and 9 Affiliates in 32 countries.
The 11th International GVN meeting was held from June 9–11, 2019 in Barcelona, Spain.
The meeting was jointly organized between GVN and the Spanish Society of Virology.
An important theme throughout the meeting was globalization and climate change.
The meeting provided an opportunity for discussion and networking, with a high participation of young Spanish virologists.
